, " EXO.13.2": Hom nkaa da yi a hom dze fii Egypt firii
"Tu mbakan nyinara si nkyɛn ma me: fii nkowaasom fi mu no; na nsa a ɔyɛ dzen na EWURADZE dze yii hom fii bea no do: mma wonndzi mbɔrkaw boodoo."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Ndɛ da yi na hom rifir edzi wɔ bosoom Abib mu."
"Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ EWURADZE nya dze wo du Keenanfo
wɔ Israelmba mu: nye Jebusfo asaase a ɔkaa ho ntam kyerɛɛ w'egyanom dɛ ɔdze bɛma wo no
wɔ onyimpa nye abowa mu nyinara; yɛ med: asaase a numfonsu nye ewo pem wɔ do no do a
"#Nka 3.13; Luk 2.23": ɔno som ɔsom yi wɔ bosoom yi mu."

, " EXO.13.2": na da a otsia esuon no bɛyɛ afahyɛ ama EWURADZE."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Wondzi epitsi boodoo nda esuon no mu nyina; na mma wonnhu mbɔrkaw boodoo wɔ wo nkyɛn
, " EXO.13.2": nkyii so mma wonnhu mbɔrkaw wɔ wo nkyɛn

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na da no kyerɛ mu kyerɛ wo ba dɛ
, " EXO.13.2": Osian dza EWURADZE yɛe maa me wɔ ber a mirifi Egypt aba no ntsi a."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ɔbɛyɛ wo wo nsa do asɛnkyerɛdze
"Tu mbakan nyinara si nkyɛn ma me: ama EWURADZE mbra no aako w'anomu: na nsa a ɔyɛ dzen na EWURADZE dze eyi wo efi Egypt."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Dɛm ntsi dzi mbra yi do wɔ ne ber mu afrenhyia daa."
"Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ EWURADZE dze wo du Keenanfo asaase do
, " EXO.13.2": dɛ mbrɛ ɔkaa ntam kyerɛɛ ɔwo nye w'egyanom no
wɔ Israelmba mu: "ɔno yi dza obue yafun mu nyinara si nkyɛn ma EWURADZE
wɔ onyimpa nye abowa mu nyinara; yɛ med: na abakan biara a ewɔ a ofi abowa mu: enyin no nyɛ EWURADZE dze."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na asoasopɔnkɔ abakan biara fa eguambaa sesa; na sɛ annsesa a
, " EXO.13.2": ɔno bu no kɔn mu; na nyimpa mbakan a wɔwɔ wo mbabanyin mu nyinara dze sesa gye hɔn."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na ɔbɛba dɛ sɛ ndaamba bi wo ba bisa wo dɛ
adze biara a obue yafun mu: Nsa a ɔyɛ dzen na EWURADZE dze yii hɛn fii Egypt

, " EXO.13.2": aber a nna Farao mmpen dɛ ɔbɛma yɛakɔ no
"Tu mbakan nyinara si nkyɛn ma me: EWURADZE kunkum Egypt asaase do mbakan nyinara
wɔ Israelmba mu: nye mbowa abakan nyina: dɛm ntsi na mo so medze enyin nyinara a wobue yafun mu no mobɔ EWURADZE afɔr; na me mbabanyin mu mbakan nyinara dze medze mbowa sesa gye hɔn."

, " EXO.13.2": nye w'enyiwa ntamu nkaadze: na nsa a ɔyɛ dzen na EWURADZE dze yii hɛn fii Egypt."
Farao maa ɔman no kwan no
"Tu mbakan nyinara si nkyɛn ma me: Nyankopɔn ammfa hɔn annkɛfa Filistiafo asaase do kwan do
adze biara a obue yafun mu: kaansa ɔno ɔbɛn mpo a; na Nyankopɔn see dɛ
wɔ Israelmba mu: Bi a bɛyɛ na ɔman no ekehyia ɔsa

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "mbom Nyankopɔn dze ɔman no danee faa Mbɛw Po no ho sar do ɔkwan do; na Israelmba no miae fii Egypt asaase do kɔree."
"Na Moses faa Josef mbiew no kaa no ho: osiandɛ ɔaka Israelmba ntam dɛ
, " EXO.13.2": Ampaara Nyankopɔn bɛba abɛsera hom; na hom mfa me mbiew nka hom ho mfi ha nkɔ."

"Na EWURADZE kaa kyerɛɛ Moses dɛ: "Na EWURADZE dzii hɔn enyim ewimbir wɔ mununkum dum mu
, " EXO.13.2": dɛ ɔrekyerɛ hɔn kwan; na anadwe wɔ gya dum mu
"Tu mbakan nyinara si nkyɛn ma me: dɛ ɔrema hɔn kan; ama wɔaanantsew ewiaber nye anadwe:"
wɔanntwe hɔnho emmfi ɔman no enyim."
